column3: Post merge ACK 3e05a57297ddc9c55604a41e50a7a94d220db7ee: more MiniWallet is better.\n\nMini maximalism: If it starts with mini it is probably good. Empirical evidence: MiniWallet, Miniscript and Minisketch.

Post merge code review ACK 3e05a57297ddc9c55604a41e50a7a94d220db7ee. Also ran the `feature_dersig.py` test and it passed with wallet disabled on MacOS.

> Mini maximalism: If it starts with mini it is probably good. Empirical evidence: MiniWallet, Miniscript and Minisketch.

Mininode [perished](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19760) however. Always an exception to the rule ðŸ˜‰
